Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:33:09
Folder: CAVHU14 - support session how to cope with pain & uncertainty during current distressing events ,
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CAVHU14_00
From: Internal News <internalnews@onechalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-06-26 15:53
Subject: Support Session | How to Cope with Pain & Uncertainty During Current Distressing Events?, Live with ExCom Feedback, Plastic Free July, Exclusive level Shoes Sale, Password Reset, Carolina Herrera Sale, PURIFICACIÓN GARCÍA Sale,  Weekly Internal Opportunit
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/4c1ffc7817bee2b49f25bcd1be9e897472736488.png> 	

Many of us continue to carry the emotional weight of the recent events that unfolded in the region. In moments like these, it helps to come together, share, and support one another.

 We invite you to join an online support session facilitated by our Wellbeing Team, in collaboration with Tanya Dharamshi, Counselling Psychologist at The Lighthouse Arabia. This session offers space to reflect and practical tools to cope with uncertainty and its emotional impact.

Calendar invites will be sent out shortly!

Plastic Free July

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1384&user=10620> 	

Join us this Plastic Free July to ditch single-use plastics, embrace sustainable habits, and spark real change—one action at a time. 

Join the challenge and post your entries here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1384&user=10620>  while challenging others to do the same. The most engaged and creative participants will win eco-friendly prizes. Let’s lead the way toward a plastic-free future. 

Small swaps, big impact.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-1-min.png> 	

Exclusive Level Shoes sale

Enjoy an exclusive Flat 50% off on select sale items, available both online and in-store for Chalhoub employees.

<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-1-min.png> 	

Exclusive Level Shoes sale

Enjoy an exclusive Flat 50% off on select sale items, available both online and in-store for Chalhoub employees.

To redeem in-store, present your Chalhoub Employee ID at checkout. For online shopping <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1385&user=10620> , log in with your Chalhoub Group email ID, and the discount will be applied at checkout.

T&Cs: Offer valid on select items and brands (non-concession). Sale items are final.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1386&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-4-min.png> 	

Password Reset Made Easier

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1387&user=10620> 	

You asked, We Listened!
If you ever forget your password or need to change it, you can do it yourself in just a few clicks from anywhere.

Visit: https://reset.chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1387&user=10620>   <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1387&user=10620> or simply scan the QR code for quick access.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-3-min.png> 	

Carolina herrera sale







Enjoy up to 50% off in stores across Qatar, Kuwait, KSA, UAE, Jordan, and Bahrain

Elevate your wardrobe with timeless elegance.
